forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 47. East northeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
